body_html:
Run this snippet:

python -c 'import torch; import os; print(os.path.dirname(torch.__file__))'

It will print a directory where torch is installed. ls it and find a file called like _C.<some_long_name>.so.
Run otool -L <path_to_torch>/_C.<some_long_name>.so and paste the result here

Run this snippet:
python -c 'import torch; import os; print(os.path.dirname(torch.__file__))'

Run otool -L <path_to_torch>/_C.<some_long_name>.so and paste the result here
body:
Run this snippet:
```
python -c 'import torch; import os; print(os.path.dirname(torch.__file__))'
```
It will print a directory where `torch` is installed. `ls` it and find a file called like `_C.<some_long_name>.so`.
Run `otool -L <path_to_torch>/_C.<some_long_name>.so` and paste the result here
